video:video.video:title: Reaching More Gamers Through Xbox Accessibility Features on Xbox One and PC
video:video.video:description: Gaming is an activity that should be enjoyable for everyone, but critical elements like chatting in social multiplayer experiences and basic navigation for some UI designs may pose challenges for some&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Holographic Rendering: One SDK to Target VR and AR Ecosystems
video:video.video:description: In this presentation, we discuss the new APIs and tools for Windows 10 developersto create universal holographic applications. Learn how your DirectX applicationcan target both virtual and augmented&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Meet the Converged Windows Store for Windows and Xbox
video:video.video:description: The new converged Store is bringing the gaming expertise of Xbox together withthe advanced merchandising capabilities of Windows. With hundreds of millionsof monthly visitors and 80% of purchases&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Xbox Live Creators Program
video:video.video:description: Get practical, hands-on technical guidance for easily integrating cross-platformXbox Live experiences in UWP games on Xbox One and Windows 10. Build yourUWP game for Windows, add Xbox Live, and ship&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Game Mode and the Evolution of Cross-Platform UWP Game Development
video:video.video:description: UWP will be the game development application model of choice, especially forpublishers that want to reach the most customers on the most platforms. Startingin 2017, UWP games can ship through the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: D3D12 Performance Tuning and Debugging with PIX and GPU Validation
video:video.video:description: D3D12 offers unprecedented access to low-level, high-performance graphicscapabilities. But with great power comes great responsibility, and D3D12 alsobrings an unprecedented ability to find innovative&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Introducing Spatial Audio Capabilities for Xbox and Windows
video:video.video:description: A key component of audio immersion is sound localization: sounds appearingto come from a specific position in space. In both virtual and augmented worlds,spatial perception can be a critical component&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Unveiling New Game Developer Opportunities with Xbox and Windows
video:video.video:description: Join Team Xbox at our opening kickoff for GDC talks. Learn how Xbox is expanding and simplifying the ways game developers can get their titles onto Xbox One consoles and Windows PCs. Get an overview&#8230;
